channel.title: Help custom helmets!
channel.description:
Well i downloaded customs and stuff and i just did the ints in the class 8 folder but there are 2 problems 1 = if i put an custom helmet in item.java (putted id of fullhelm by wear catergory fullhelm) it still wears the custom as weapon but all other works please can u guys explain this to me? :( 2 = if i get an notepad file of an custom how can i know the ints for it and how can i pack it into an archive like 10394.gz and which name should i give the file if i only got one like only wear or only the drop file
Already thanks for your support

item.title: Help custom helmets!
item.dc:creator: @loliepopcool loliepopcool
item.description:
@loliepopcool wrote:

Well i downloaded customs and stuff and i just did the ints in the class 8 folder but there are 2 problems
1 = if i put an custom helmet in item.java (putted id of fullhelm by wear catergory fullhelm) it still wears the custom as weapon but all other works please can u guys explain this to me?
